periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 43, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. West wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 9am and 5pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 43 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 33. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 45. Northeast wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 37. East wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Cloudy, with a high near 57. South wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 41. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain And Snow
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow after noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. North northeast wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Rain and snow. Cloudy, with a low around 30. Northeast wind 7 to 10 mph. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. North northeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. North northeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain And Snow
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow after noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. North northeast wind around 9 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
